review: Most of the time, however I find if I pause for extended period, and go back it will freeze up. Then I have to re-boot by holding center button and (Play-Pause Button) That is frustrating. Other than that, it works the way I want it to with my "Prime" movies and Netflix. I'm glad you have the trouble shooting available so many of these problems are easily solved.
author: Bonnie "BJS"

review: I'm not really inpressed at all with the fire stick.  I have a roku as well and I have found the fire stick more complicated with less viewing content.  I have it stored in a box.
author: B. Armstead "keyrup"

review: Very very good. I love it. I Recomend it. Sometimes Fire TV stick loss the conexion in Netflix and I conversed with a good friend who told me that the problem is the internet conexion.
author: pink mother "Bony"

review: I have the amazon fire box and purchased for another room, so I could access programs in my bedroom as well as the front room. It works great,( as well as the box does). It is nice not having to use a game box to access Netflix etc. and I am able to play some games through this as well.
author: donna beaudry

review: This is a great little device for the price and my baby girl loves it.
author: R. Franklin "Durell"

review: The fire stick works almost as well as the fire tv it very rarely has an issue with slow speed.
author: Robert G.

review: Works great and super easy to hook up.
author: Leah
